name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a dedicated Python Developer with 8 years of experience, I excel in delivering high-performance applications using **Python**, **Django**, **Flask**, and **FastAPI** technologies. My expertise encompasses CI/CD practices leveraging **Docker** and extensive experience with **AWS** services for deploying scalable solutions. I am adept at data modeling and ETL processes and have worked with **SQL**, **Spark**, and **Databricks** for robust data engineering tasks. 

I have successfully led projects utilizing **Airflow** for orchestration and **dbt** for data transformation, ensuring that solutions are aligned with Agile methodologies. My background includes integrating AI capabilities into applications, demonstrating a creative approach to solve complex client needs. I thrive in proactive, client-oriented environments and maintain a flexible and open-minded attitude towards problem-solving.
